Articles.Content:
This video turned out to be pretty fun and over the top. Enjoy the soothing sounds of our Japanese poetry about Kerbal Space Program ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZClE9IoElnQ?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You can visit our channel [here](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCmAVWm58KaBuFdRa04KauXw). If you like it we'd appreciate a subscribe. Thanks!
